actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill requiring that each Member of Congress be notified of the intended disposition of federally owned real property in the district he represents.

summary.text: Requires the Administrator of General Services to notify in writing each Member of the House of Representatives and Senate of the intended disposition of federally owned real property in the district the Representative represents and State that the Senator represents.

titles.title: A bill requiring that each Member of Congress be notified of the intended disposition of federally owned real property in the district he represents.
